title: Mishri
overview: Mishri is a tale of a young girl who is considered a lucky charm by her village. Mishri, who finds happiness in other's happiness is adored by her entire village, yearns for love and family. Her purpose in life is to fulfill her late father's dream to educate herself and make him proud. How will her life unfold when fate entangles her with Raghav and Vaani? How will Mishri fulfill her dreams and bring sweetness to her life?
